website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you are looking for a smaller body pillow but there are better options available for full-body pillows.
pros: Ideal for customers seeking a reliable, compact pillow without sacrificing quality
cons: Doesn't come with a pillow cover

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Puffy. Not So Squishy.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is WAY overfilled. You are sitting up if you lay your head on it. It's not too good for spooning either. I'm only 5'3" and have T-Rex arms. My arm nor leg is comfortable in the stratosphere when I drape both over this laying on my side. If you like your pillows SUPER puffy or have heavy appendages to bash this down some, this could be for you!
customer_reviews.author: watkinson1207

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I pulled the trigger on this mainly cause it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my preggo wife since she needed some support for a growing baby. I scoured amazon for preggo pillows and read quite a few reviews, and compare the prices to pros and cons. I'm happy I pulled the trigger on this mainly cause it served it's purpose and helps her sleep, but also because the cost savings vs preggo specific pillows and the function of a body pillow after the baby gets ejected. Do yourself a favor and pick one up and don't forget the cover. Also the pillow is not extremely firm and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leomodz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one was good, the other terrible, it was flat after just a few weeks. Worth buying the better option here on Amazon (Pinzon I think it is), I have 2 of those and they are great. 1 year later: don't waste your money on these pillows, buy the Pinzon ones, they will hold up and be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dreams
customer_reviews.text: First, make sure you know that this pillow does not come with a cover... as it states. We received the body pillow for our 15 year old daughter and have been pleased. It is a great product for a 15 year old of average height and weight to use as a body pillow for lounging and or sleeping. The material seems to be well constructed. I noticed no imperfections, rips or pulls in the material. I would purchase one again.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah2911

customer_reviews.title: What I needed, but a bit too firm for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even an inch over 5' and the size of this pillow is very nice for me. A bit firmer than I care for, but if I can position myself correctly, I sleep so well and wake up with less pain. I have severe scoliosis; my spine has two curves so it's shaped like an 'S,' which twists by back so that one side is higher than the other when I'm lying flat on my back. So my chiropractor recommended I sleep on my side with a body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yam

customer_reviews.title: I've never slept with a body pillow until I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never slept with a body pillow until I purchased this one, but I start out with it every night. I am a side sleeper and always start out on my left side. Sometime during the night, I end up on my back and will use the pillow to tilt myself to the right to ease back discomfort. The pillow has maintained its loft, and it isn't too hot to sleep against. I would buy this pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Martin

customer_reviews.title: comfy pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pregnant wife instead of the super expensive pillows made specifically for pregnancy. Would have tried them both read how they get flat quickly. She loves it so far (currently at 4 months). I'm a side sleeper and tried it myself, and I would've gotten one too if pillows wouldn't be taking over our whole entire bed!
customer_reviews.author: Defman2g

customer_reviews.title: It's fluffity!  It's comforting!  1-2-3-4-5 (stars)!
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to complain about a pillow like this, I'm sure you're the sort who walks into Home Depot wearing flip-flops on a Wednesday afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: That person from that one thing!

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty. After a few days of use, the pillow loses its fluff and becomes very flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: way too soft
customer_reviews.text: didn't begin to fill out a pillow form that size, we were using for a decorative pilot form, and I don't like them stuffed hard, but I had to add a lot to make this work. I think if you slept with its it would flatten immediately. I didn't contact seller, they most likely would have taken it back, i was under a time crunch, it s VERYYY SOFTTT Pillow
customer_reviews.author: newshower

customer_reviews.title: Bad back? Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable for anyone with back pain. Keeps the back aligned better than one single or even two separate pillows. Would recommend and buy again. I do wish the material was just a wee bit more squishy but overall it's great.
customer_reviews.author: hettar7

customer_reviews.title: EZ Dreams Body Pillow, White
customer_reviews.text: What a wrong pillow!! Update: what a wonderful pillow that only lasted about 4 months before they were flat. I need body pillows that keep me from rolling onto my stomach or back. When back surgery didn't fix the problem, I can't lay flat, I can sleep only on my sides. So pillow have to be able to stop me in the night. I also expect them to last longer than 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy & undersized Euro Square
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to fill some euro style cases. Disappointing. Measured my cases to order the correct size but what I received was lumpy and undersized with no stuffing in the corners at all. I would have ordered the next larger size had the quality been decent. Luckily the service for returns was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Zinderella

customer_reviews.title: Not the size i wanted or needed.
customer_reviews.text: Its soft but i was told that this pillow was 20" x 60" I looked at the description before buying to confirm that it was 20"x60", but when it arrived, it came out to be 20"x54" and i look at the description now only to see that it now says 20"x54". Very dissatisfied with this, but i will admit that it is comfortable, just not the size i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ciel_CL

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the pillow. It is a "little too puffy" I find that I cannot totally get comfortable since my head sits a little high. I am trying to work it down a bit. Using about a month now. We will see if it adjusts better.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow for tall person!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my husband to replace an old one he had. I personally think the pillow is too big but he thinks it perfect! I'm 5'1" and he's 6'2" maybe that has something to do with it! My husband is a side sleeper and uses the pillow as support between the knees. He is satisfied with the pillow and it has retained its shape thus far! I was concerned about the packaging thinking that the pillow was going to be shoved into a tiny box but that was not the case at all. The box was large enough for the pillow to fit without being mis-shaped! Overall, he is satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!  But...
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason this pillow is undoubtedly 4 stars. First, the pillow itself is great if you're looking for something huggable with good quality material. But secondly, if you're looking for something to fit perhaps a dakimakura cover, you might want to look elsewhere. I bought this hoping it would perfectly fit the pillow case, but there's a little extra room that I wish wasn't there. If you don't mind that extra room to your pillow case, then I recommend this pillow for you. If you dislike that extra room in your pillow case and want a perfect fit, try looking for a different pillow insteas
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Apantenco

customer_reviews.title: Just like the description
customer_reviews.text: Great body pillow. Very full. Medium softness. Purchased for pregnancy but found the pillow to be too big for comfort. It also was very hot. Ended up purchasing a smaller body pillow designed for pregnancy. Great body pillow for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Its nice and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: The pillow case is longer than the pillow....SO I wish I got a longer pillow...or a standard size one. Its nice and fluffy, and I sleep with it every night....or at least I fall asleep with it every time...and when I wake up....its on the floor... lol
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Use them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I really like these body pillows. I replace mine every two-three years.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: Firm but still soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: It's one inch off but that doesn't really matter I guess what I really cared about is the firmness of it. It really is very firm but no so much that it isn't soft and comfortable while still keeping it's shape after hugging. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow, kept its shape!
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow, held its shape and fluffiness very well. And its used EVERYDAY!! I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a new or to replace an old body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PILLOW IS SO COMFY AND AMAZING I LOVE IT!!!! I wish I just had like 2 more of these on my bed, and then I could drop out of college and sleep all through my life. I did make sure to get a good pillowcase and I'm loving it so far. I'd never had a body pillow before, and I'm so glad I caved. These are spongy but not too firm nor too soft for my taste. :D :D
customer_reviews.author: Watumba

customer_reviews.title: Better than price range suggests
customer_reviews.text: I feel that, after sleeping on this it was indeed a good buy . This pillow would have been 30$ at big box stores, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest pillow I have ever tried to use....chunky stuffing ...awful!
customer_reviews.author: sally21

customer_reviews.title: ... hoping for/expecting a firm pillow that wouldn't break down easy. I've had mine a couple months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for/expecting a firm pillow that wouldn't break down easy. I've had mine a couple months now and I can already tell it's not going to last. This body pillow is about as good as the one I got at WalMart for half the price. It is not the durable FIRM resiliant body pillow I had hoped for. But it's useable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow with the right firmness to it for a body pillow. My husband loves this thing at night. We use 2 standard pillow cases because the body pillowcase we got on amazon (300 threadcount) was way to scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: JandC.T

customer_reviews.title: Affordable European version pillows
customer_reviews.text: Similar pillows at Bead, Bath and Beyond were more expensive so this item won my attention. They are well made and serve the purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted...........
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just what I was looking for and the price was even better. Scheduled to have surgery and wanted a body pillow will be of some comfort afterwards. As well, the price was just right and it arrived quickly. Very satisfied with product ordered.
customer_reviews.author: LJ GLEASON

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a new body pillow to sleep with because you like to put your leg on something while you sleep
customer_reviews.text: WOW! If you're looking for a new body pillow to sleep with because you like to put your leg on something while you sleep...lets just say, this will be your new boyfriend!!! (-_-.) just enough fluffiness to ease your back/hip pain (side sleeper) recommend 100x
customer_reviews.author: frances gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Firm and a comforting presence at my side, great for dakimakuras
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'0" and this was taller than me! It's soft and firm at the same time; I can sink into it and feel comforted. I'm using it for my dakimakura and it's absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAmateur

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Way too poofy! For me, it caused a great deal of stress on my back to try and "cuddle" with it like I do my other pillows. I am going to return them, they are just not huggable for sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: ToddlerMama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift. She loves this pillow. The quality is great and the item is just as it was described in the ad. Great price
customer_reviews.author: LG 337

customer_reviews.title: This body pillow seemed nice right out of the package but it broke down ...
customer_reviews.text: This body pillow seemed nice right out of the package but it broke down in less than two weeks. I replaced it on week three. No bueno.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Winters

customer_reviews.title: Too fluffy
customer_reviews.text: i read the reviews and I saw many "too fluffy" complaints. I thought, that's ridiculous complaining that a pillow is too fluffy. Well it is, there is way too much stuffing in this pillow, I had a really hard time getting any pillow case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Euro pillows
customer_reviews.text: Had these about a month and they get fairly frequent daily use, still perfectly puffy. Not super firm like a floor cushion, which is fine by me as I bought them for my couch. True to listed measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha D.

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is ok. It is fairly soft though. I wanted something a bit more firm for some back support on a sofa-bed. It works well for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: ETAV8R

customer_reviews.title: but when taken out of protective packaging it was dirty (several large
customer_reviews.text: Pillow arrived in a timely fashion and was boxed well, but when taken out of protective packaging it was dirty (several large, charcoal-like smears) and required washing. Otherwise, decent quality for an inexpensive, light-weight body pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Body Pillow
customer_reviews.text: My fiance LOVED THIS! He was in need of a new body pillow, and I got this for his Birthday. It is REALLY fluffy & full and does not seem to be depleting in size at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect body pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at 1st but this pillow is amazing! Very fluffy but not to the point were your head just sinks, it has the perfect balance of comfort, softness, keeps it's shape & quality! This pillow is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Glackin

customer_reviews.title: awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This was the PERFECT mix of being firm enough to support my knees from touching when I lay on my side. I am really happy with this. I will update this review in about 6 months to see the long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Neeks

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as 54". It's not even close to 54", even if you measure all the way to the end of the government warning tags. The over all length of the pillow is less than 46" and will not work for the purpose I purchased it for. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Volby

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in a regular size bed and this keeps my head from slipping between two regular pillows and I now sleep much better. I just hope that over time it does not compact in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: Support at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it is large. Provides good support. Recommend American Pillowcase for outer cover. I recommend this product and buyer should note its size.
customer_reviews.author: truckerloyd

customer_reviews.title: great value for price
customer_reviews.text: love this! holds shape well so far and feels comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The PC Specialist

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat fairly fast
customer_reviews.text: My pillow went fairly flat in about 3 months. I expected a little more time to go by than that before I considered buying another body pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzawn

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had that long and already tearing and bunching up.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy pillow. Not flimsy like some. I haven't had it very long but so far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfy and very fluffy! I'm short (5''4') and this pillow is perfect to sleep with. The delivery was fast and earlier than expected as well.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.V

customer_reviews.title: so it might get better with time like some pillows
customer_reviews.text: Not real firm , I have only been using it for a week or so now , so it might get better with time like some pillows , real soft
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Nice big pillow. . .
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow when it arrived. Cushy and perfect size. After a month, its getting a little compressed because I use it each night but for the price its a nice big, soft pillow.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Don't forget to buy a cover because I did and now I might just leave it w out. Product and packaging is great. Not to soft or hard, doesn't get flat, very long. Better then I expected! ❤
customer_reviews.author: R M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good for sleeping i use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Seroni

customer_reviews.title: Flully But Not Firm
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a pillow that is firm, this is not the one for you. However, if you want an pillow that is fluffy with not too much support this is the one I'd recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chad K

customer_reviews.title: Dreamland body pillow
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the boyfriend and he loves it. Nice soft and supports his back and shoulders from pain.
customer_reviews.author: Msnikolita

customer_reviews.title: Fashion pillow
customer_reviews.text: My son has allergies and was no happy with the other pillows that we had purchased for him from the department store. This pillow worked out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Beyea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's a body pillow, serves its purpose, not much else to say about it
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ball

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is dreamy. Super fluffy, but not hard. Great for side sleepers. I put a microsuede cover on and it is soft, too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimigo

customer_reviews.title: So cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says it is. Very comfortable to hug, absolutely no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: - Came very dirty near one end
customer_reviews.text: - Came very dirty near one end, had to wash off the black marks (which was pretty hard) before use. - Amount of filling was just barely decent - was expecting more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and More
customer_reviews.text: "Dreamland" says it all. This pillow is worth its weight in gold. I sleep so much more comfortably now. I wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is hot. It's nice and full if you're using for decoration only. I won't use it though, as it is way too hot to snuggle on.
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey castle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its pretty full will take time to flatten a litle
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a pillowcase
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is terrific. I could never use a regular pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves how her back feel's so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Henry McCoy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this for about a month now, and I like it, but I don't love it. The filling started out as being enough, but it's compacted quite a bit since. It's a good, cheap body pillow, but not the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Gradinariu

customer_reviews.title: Say hello to this magical girl/boy friend replacement! Well ...
customer_reviews.text: Say hello to this magical girl/boy friend replacement! Well, for cuddles at least. Not the other stuff, don't be gross.
customer_reviews.author: Labra

customer_reviews.title: Its 47 inches, NOT 54 inches, that's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Its 47 inches, NOT 54 inches, that's not even close. If length is important for you then do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Haoming

customer_reviews.title: but works fine to prop against the wall to alleviate the cold
customer_reviews.text: Really squishy and soft, but works fine to prop against the wall to alleviate the cold.
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: My son is still young so I don't know how ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is still young so I don't know how this will hold up over time, but we use it at the foot of his bead and it works for what we need!
customer_reviews.author: marinewife1111

customer_reviews.title: Great body pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great body pillow, holds shaped well no matter how much I trash and holding it's own with the cat as well........LOL
customer_reviews.author: beachbunny

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Soft and keeps it shape. It is very thick and offers great support.
customer_reviews.author: Shameka Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. We just got it so I don't know how it'll hold up but for now, its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SF FAN

customer_reviews.title: ... too full I suggest to remove some stuffing but nice product
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying it really full though can't sleep with just decor so if you want one to sleep with not this one too full I suggest to remove some stuffing but nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine, but be advised this is one fat momma ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine, but be advised this is one fat momma of a pillow. If you like BIG pillows, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: John W Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its not the most comfortable pillow but it does its job
customer_reviews.author: Cyber624

customer_reviews.title: ... be quite honest but all in all I still liked it!
customer_reviews.text: It couldve used a bit more fluff in it to be quite honest but all in all I still liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Nebri

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was pregnant at the time and she just loved it. She still uses it. Does not lose shape or volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it! it's on the soft side, so don't purchase if you're looking for firm support.
customer_reviews.author: iscahstar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great body pillow! Bought to use for both pregnant and elderly patients during massage therapy
customer_reviews.author: S. Abdool

customer_reviews.title: the pillow seems to be good quality and was received promptly
customer_reviews.text: the pillow seems to be good quality and was received promptly. It fit my sham perfectly BUT it is VERY Dense and round and way too thick for me to enjoy. I didn't realize that I wanted a thinner more soft pillow. I would consider this one extra firm. Time will tell if it will soften up, but I doubt it. If you like a very full and dense pillow you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable. I plan to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for quite sometime now and it has really kept it's shape. It's very comfortable. I plan to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good for the price. I bought this pillow in my second trimester and so far i am liking it and it helps me to be more comfortable at night. It feels like a regular pillow you would buy at the store only that this one is larger.
customer_reviews.author: karmina

customer_reviews.title: Big and fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: Super big, fluffy pillow! The kids looooove it in the gameroom!
customer_reviews.author: kn50443

customer_reviews.title: Poor package handling.
customer_reviews.text: While the pillow is soft and wonderful, I am unhappy to find grease stains on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pillow itself is nice, however it has dirt smudges on it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great! They are just what I need for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: piglet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and fluffy. I have had this for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Suze S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: really the best body pillow $20 can get you, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mother's day. She loves it, uses it every day. Wish it came with a pillow case, but that was an easy fix. Would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too puffy for my liking but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillow! Perfect! Would give it 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: erwinh22

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: After a month or so of nightly use, my pillow is holding up fairly well, kinda flat in places of most use but overall still pretty fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian P. Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not the highest quality, I've been using it for my pregnancy (I'm 7.5 months now) and it works just fine for the price. Totally works.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Low quality pillow, similar if not worse than what you'd get at walmart but double the price. The pillow is lumpy, not comfortable at all. You're better off going to target and buying one at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: My wife has used then her whole pregnancy and not ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used then her whole pregnancy and not complained once. You need to buy two for back support.
customer_reviews.author: Martino

customer_reviews.title: No more tossing and turning!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Solved my tossing and turning problem by simply hugging this pillow. Only critique I have is that it isn't completely plush and could easily use some additional stuffing, but it worked decently enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flattens out pretty after about a
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. Flattens out pretty after about a month
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lambert

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is perfect and so snuggly
customer_reviews.text: My pillow cover (that I bought elsewhere) hasn't even arrived yet, but I couldn't resist sleeping with this anyway. This pillow is perfect and so snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Sezer

customer_reviews.title: High quality best one I have found
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow. Keeps its fluff for a long time. Get a cover!
customer_reviews.author: Seahawks

product_meta.title: Pegasus Home Fashions Body Pillow, White
product_meta.description: Size:BodyEZ Dreams white body pillow is perfect for cuddling in all positions and even for expectant mothers. Generously filled with hypoallergenic fiberfill. Will stay soft and supportive night after night. The white body pillow can be left as is or you can add a protective cover. Machine wash and dry for easy care.
feature_bullets: Great for expectant mothers or to cuddle in any position
Machine wash and tumble dry low for easy care
